head_iterator.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_HEAD_ITERATOR_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_HEAD_ITERATOR_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // head_iterator.hpp

00018 
00019 #include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00022 
00023 namespace boost {
00024 namespace archive {
00025 namespace iterators {
00026 
00027 template<class Predicate, class Base>
00028 class head_iterator
00029     : public boost::iterator_adaptor<
00030         head_iterator<Predicate, Base>,
00031         Base,
00032         use_default,
00033         single_pass_traversal_tag
00034     >
00035 {
00036 private:
00037     friend class iterator_core_access;
00038     typedef boost::iterator_adaptor<
00039         head_iterator<Predicate, Base>,
00040         Base,
00041         use_default,
00042         single_pass_traversal_tag
00043     > super_t;
00044 
00045     typedef head_iterator<Predicate, Base> this_t;
00046     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME super_t::value_type value_type;
00047     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME super_t::reference reference_type;
00048 
00049     reference_type dereference_impl(){
00050         if(! m_end){
00051             while(! m_predicate(* this->base_reference()))
00052                 ++ this->base_reference();
00053             m_end = true;
00054         }
00055         return * this->base_reference();
00056     }
00057 
00058     reference_type dereference() const {
00059         return const_cast<this_t *>(this)->dereference_impl();
00060     }
00061 
00062     void increment(){
00063         ++base_reference();
00064     }
00065     Predicate m_predicate;
00066     bool m_end;
00067 public:
00068     template<class T>
00069     head_iterator(Predicate f, T start) : 
00070         super_t(Base(start)), 
00071         m_predicate(f),
00072         m_end(false)
00073     {}
00074 
00075 };
00076 
00077 } // namespace iterators
00078 } // namespace archive
00079 } // namespace boost
00080 
00081 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_HEAD_ITERATOR_HPP
